description: I have developed excellent communication skills in my work as a teacher for 10+ years. I work with students individually to help them understand and develop the skills they need to be successful. I can explain complex topics in a way that a novice or beginner can understand.

My focus has been in mathematics--the champion of problem-solving. I love a good problem and finding solutions, methods, and other tools to accomplish the task. I'm always seeking to solve potential problems and improve optimization.
I am a self-starter and independent worker. I have years of experience working on projects independently for my work. I am always looking for new ways to improve my skills and work environment.
I am CompTIA Network+ Certified and I am very savvy with computers.  I am the in-house tech support for Uinta Academy and Badger Screen Printing Co. (recently hired as a contractor).
